findings.title: BC - Blacklisted Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from transactions, which may be exploited by calling the setIsBot function.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: There are segments that contain unused state variables.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Functions that are not used in the contract, making the code's size bigger.

findings.title: L12 - Using Variables before Declaration
findings.description: The contract is using a variable before the declaration.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters.

findings.title: L15 - Local Scope Variable Shadowing
findings.description: Variables defined in the local scope containing the same name from an upper scope.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: Variables defined in the local scope and are not initialized.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause loss of precision.

findings.title: Blacklist Users from Trading
findings.description: The contract owner can blacklist users from trading.
